name: Paper Crafts
description:
Paper crafts is a game developed in SEA GAME JAM 2019 which includes two players compete against each other by planning their attack in each round. Dive in and grab a pal of yours and compete together . 

Features: 

-Cartoonish and Appealing Art Style

-1vs1 Competition  

My Role: Game Programmer

This game has been created for SEA GAME Jam 2019 in 36 hours. 

We successfully managed to achieve 2nd Runner-up place in the ceremony placed in LVL UP KL 2019
